M. Papa Samba Diop est titulaire d’un Ma: Mr. Papa Samba Diop holds a Master 1 in Computer Engineering as well as a DESS in Microenterprise Management. With over 8 years of experience as a senior data engineer, he has developed solid expertise in the design and deployment of data processing solutions, in both cloud and on-premise environments.
Certifié dans plus de six domaines clés,: Certified in more than six key areas, including Apache Spark 3.0 Python, Azure Data Engineer, Azure Power BI, Azure Data Fundamentals, and IBM Enterprise Design Thinking, Mr. Diop masters a wide range of cloud and analytical technologies such as Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Databricks, Azure Data Factory, SQL Server, Oracle, Hive, HDInsight, Hortonworks, Cloudera, PySpark, and Power BI. His training in MS Fabric and Synapse strengthens his ability to meet complex business needs for digital transformation.
Reconnu pour sa polyvalence, son autonom: Recognized for his versatility, autonomy, and sense of customer service, Mr. Diop demonstrates a great capacity for adaptation and a remarkable team spirit. He is distinguished by his rigor, quick learning ability, and aptitude for solving complex problems, making him a strategic asset for any data management and valuation project.
